author: pburba
msg: Follow-up to r24811, 24821, fix implied merge source handling.
* subversion/libsvn_client/log.c
(svn_client__get_copy_source): Treat path_or_url == "" as a URL and be sure
to pass svn_client_log3() a valid peg revision.
* subversion/svn/merge-cmd.c
(svn_cl__merge): Don't check uninitialized peg revision before
defaulting to HEAD if no merge source and target was specified.
* subversion/tests/cmdline/merge_tests.py
(test_list): Remove XFail from
mergeinfo_inheritance_and_discontinuous_ranges.

author: lgo
msg: Add the --list option to win-tests.py. The option will be passed to all test
programs, though not all seem to handle it correctly yet (fs-test, locks-test,
target-test.py).
* win-tests.py
(global, _usage_exit): add the --list option
* build/run_tests.py
(TestHarness.__init__): add list_tests option
(_run_test): pass the --list option to the test program

author: lgo
msg: Don't create the pristine repository when only the list of tests is requested.
* subversion/tests/cmdline/svntest/main.py
(global): reorder the initialization so if --list is specified no pristine
repository is created.

author: lgo
msg: * STATUS: add revision to the r24697 group

author: lgo
msg: Follow up r24793: revert unneeded change which breaks other tests.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/props.c
(svn_wc__load_props): this change is not needed anymore, because since r24793
entry->has_props is always up to date when replacing a file.
